Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2019...
Injured on 5/21/2019 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 2-3 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/8/2021...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/10/2021, off Jame Meany (HOU)...
Injured on 7/21/2021 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Cincinnati to Detroit on 2/3/2022 (Going to DET: 3B Edward Clinard, 3B Cedrick Fernandez, P Deangelo Montejano, CF Andrew Ruggles, P Thurman Brawley. Going to CIN: P Rodney Schloss)...
Traded from Detroit to New York on 7/10/2022 (Going to DET: C Issac Scott, P Jason Saterfiel. Going to NY: SS Robert Guerriero, P Deangelo Montejano, C Leo Vinyals)...
Injured on 3/10/2024 with a Spasms Back, out for 3 weeks...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Chicago on 9/27/2024, striking out 5...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2026: Gets a new one-year contract worth $871,429 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2027: Gets a new one-year contract worth $871,429 through salary arbitration...
8/4/2027: Signed a contract extension with New York , $6,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Released by New York on 4/11/2029...

9/6/2029: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $6,000,000 per year, for 1 years.
